description.value: Transifex command-line client before 0.10 does not validate X.509 certificates for data transfer connections, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof a Transifex server via an arbitrary certificate.  NOTE: this vulnerability exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2013-2073.

references.name: [oss-security] 20131215 Re: CVE-2013-2073 transifex-client: Does not validate HTTPS server certificate (fixed in transifex-client v0.9)
[oss-security] 20131213 Re: CVE-2013-2073 transifex-client: Does not validate HTTPS server certificate (fixed in transifex-client v0.9)

description.value: Transifex command-line client before 0.9 does not validate X.509 certificates, which allows man-in-the-middle attackers to spoof a Transifex server via an arbitrary certificate.

references.name: [oss-security] 20130522 CVE-2013-2073 transifex-client: Does not validate HTTPS server certificate (fixed in transifex-client v0.9)
